text: Slavi Zhekov (; born 21 August 1976) is a former Bulgarian footballer who played as a midfielder. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Cherno More **Bulgarian Cup: ***Runner-up: 2005-06 * Beroe **Bulgarian Cup: ***Winner: 2009-10 ==External links== * Profile at beroe.eu Category:Bulgarian footballers Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:First Professional Football League (Bulgaria) players Category:FC Chernomorets Burgas players Category:PFC Beroe Stara Zagora players Category:PFC Cherno More Varna players Category:Sportspeople from Stara Zagora
title: Slavi Zhekov
